title: An intelligent person says something in a long and complex way that's difficult to understand
body:
A very intelligent person says something simply and quickly, using the most straightforward words and ideas that can be used without losing the meaning of what they're trying to say.

Unfortunately, most reasonably intelligent people fit solidly into the first category and think that making things intentionally complex is clever, and that by communicating badly their intelligence will be shown to surpass that of the people they interact with to the point where those people can't even understand what is being said. Of course, what those people actually think is "wow this guy makes no sense, I wish he would communicate better".
